title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 183.3 - Qualifications for Appointment as an Assistant License Issuing Officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 183.3 - Qualifications for Appointment as an Assistant License Issuing Officer

State Regulations
(a) A license
issuing officer may nominate for appointment as assistant license issuing
officers employees in their place of business. (b) To be eligible for appointment as an
assistant license issuing officer, such employee will have to meet the
eligibility requirements set forth in section
183.2
(b) of this

Part. (c) The license issuing
officer will be responsible for the proper performance of such assistant
license issuing officers in regard to the issuance of licenses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
183.3

Amended

New

York State Register September 14, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 37, eff. 9/14/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
